name: Arcus Chroma
description:
Arcus Chroma is a Fantasy 2D fighting game with a similar gameplay style to Hyper Hitboxing (my previous game). This game is built around a Juggle combo system and fast paced combat.

This game is still in development, not everything works properly yet.

Current features:

  • Versus Mode (Vs player and CPU)
  • Training Mode
  • Offline PvP
  • 4 Playable characters

Planed features (All future updates will be Free):

  • More characters
  • More stages
  • More color palettes 
  • Arcade mode
  • More training mode options
  • Written story/lore
  • (if the opportunity rises, ill add online multiplayer)
